pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://travis-ci.org/opennode/waldur-core.svg?branch=develop :target: https://travis-ci.org/opennode/waldur-core :alt: Build statusWaldur Core===========Waldur Core is an open-source RESTful server for multi-tenant resource management. It provides aneasy way for sharing access to external systems. It is used as a platform for creating private andpublic clouds.Additional information can be found at http://docs.waldur.com.Support=======Professional support options are available. Please contact info@opennodecloud.com for details.Development environment setup-----------------------------Instructions here: https://github.com/opennode/waldur-core/blob/develop/docs/guide/install-from-src.rst.
